snippet: The president, who was addressing fellow party members at the Democratic National Committee, said the G.O.P. talked about helping the middle class but passed bills to benefit the wealthy.
abstract: Pres Obama blasts Republicans at Democratic National Committee winter meeting for claiming that they care about fate of middle class; highlights economic progress United States has made during his time in office.
lead_paragraph: The president, who was addressing fellow party members at the Democratic National Committee, said the G.O.P. talked about helping the middle class but passed bills to benefit the wealthy.

headline.main: Obama Asserts G.O.P.’s Actions Fail to Match Its Words
headline.print_headline: Obama Asserts G.O.P.’s Actions Fail to Match Its Words
